rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with open layout to facilitate ease of movement and adherence to local building norms. Vastu-aligned entrance facing east for positive energy flow.

Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facade, ensuring abundant natural light. Integrated built-in storage and Vastu-compliant placement of seating area oriented towards the north.
Modular kitchen design that is wheelchair accessible, incorporating wide counter spaces and ample under-counter storage, with openings towards east for positive energy flow.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom designed with non-slip floors, grab bars, and easy-to-reach fixtures. Vastu-aligned placement to ensure harmonious energy circulation.

openings.description: Large, wheelchair-accessible main entrance door facing east for auspicious entry. Reinforced glass to accommodate floor-to-ceiling window aesthetics while ensuring privacy and safety.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the living room on the south facade maximizing natural light. Vastu-aligned to promote positive energy flow.
Accessible spiral staircase with a wheelchair-accessible ramp integrated alongside, ensuring safe transition between levels while maintaining aesthetic appeal and adherence to local building codes.
Rooftop terrace access door on the rear of the building, designed for accessibility and ease of movement. Vastu alignment considered with open space layout for relaxation and energy balance.
